00032 /* =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
00033  *   BSP (Board Support Package)
00034  *   Target : Texas Instruments EZ430-RF2500
00035  *            "MSP430 Wireless Development Tool"
00036  *   Top-level driver file.
00037  * =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
00038  */
00039 
00040 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041  *                                            Includes
00042  * ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043  */
00044 #include "bsp_driver_defs.h"
00045 #include "bsp_leds.h"
00046 #include "bsp_buttons.h"
00047 
00048 
00049 /**************************************************************************************************
00050  * @fn          BSP_InitDrivers
00051  *
00052  * @brief       Initialize all enabled BSP drivers.
00053  *
00054  * @param       none
00055  *
00056  * @return      none
00057  **************************************************************************************************
00058  */
00059 void BSP_InitDrivers(void)
00060 {
00061 #if (!defined BSP_NO_LEDS)
00062   BSP_InitLeds();
00063 #endif
00064 
00065 #if (!defined BSP_NO_BUTTONS)
00066   BSP_InitButtons();
00067 #endif
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 /* ================================================================================================
00072  *                                        C Code Includes
00073  * ================================================================================================
00074  */
00075 #if (!defined BSP_NO_LEDS)
00076 #include "drivers/code/bsp_leds.c"
00077 #endif
00078 
00079 #if (!defined BSP_NO_BUTTONS)
00080 #include "drivers/code/bsp_buttons.c"
00081 #endif
00082 
00083 
00084 /**************************************************************************************************
00085 */
00086
